action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Mathematics
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Twenty years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Master
OTHER-SKILLS: Python
AVAILABILITY: Last week of January

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <one sentence>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <one sentence>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
